segments.text: Congratulations , Francis . Your hard working finally pays off . I am so happy for your promotion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Monica . Without support from you and other colleagues , I would not have made it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope I could get promoted some day . Tell me about your experience , ok ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , just saying that you wanted to get promoted is not enough , you need to write down your desirable position and an available plan for achieving that adjective . Don â€™ t be afraid of taking challenging . They might be opportunities and failing is not fatal . You learn more from that actually . Sometimes , you need to fail to be successful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you think if I volunteer for some work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it is a smart idea . Our boss always likes it when employees take initiatives .
segments.speaker: S2
